rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a North-facing facade aligning with Vastu principles to enhance positivity. It integrates natural light and provides an immediate sense of calm.

rooms.name: Living Room & Kitchen Open-Plan Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living area that seamlessly connects with the kitchen. Incorporates Scandinavian style furniture, functional minimalism and a modern farmhouse aesthetic.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated space for work and study, designed with Scandinavian simplicity and equipped with built-in shelves and ergonomic furniture.

openings.description: North-facing main entrance in compliance with Vastu principles ensuring prosperity and positivity. It opens directly into the Entrance Hall.
